product_name: CygoLite Expilion 720 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: The Expilion 720 boasts a new oval-spread optical system with a powerful LED bulb, lighting up roads and trails with an astounding 720 lumens of extra-wide spread and distant throw for safer rides.
short_description: The Expilion 720 boasts a new oval-spread optical system with a powerful LED bulb, lighting up roads and trails with an astounding 720 lumens of extra-wide spread and distant throw for safer rides.
